alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 29 at 12:23PM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: .Snow melt and increased reservoir releases may cause the Little Bear River below Hyrum Dam to Cutler Reservoir to exceed safe channel capacity. As a result minor flooding is possible in these areas. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is possible. * WHERE...The Little Bear River below Hyrum Dam to Cutler Reservoir. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding along the Little Bear River below Hyrum Reservoir. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
